data.code_commit_message:
feat(ANEM): Add GPIO, Timer, and UART peripheral source files

New peripheral implementations and their test infrastructure:
- gpio/gpio.vhd: 2-port GPIO with per-bit tristate and direction registers
- timer/timer.vhd: 16-bit timer with prescaler, compare match, auto-reload
- uart/uart.vhd: UART with TX/RX FSMs and 16x oversampling baud generator
- Test benches (tb_gpio, tb_timer, tb_uart) and assembly test programs
